h4_modal_description_fail_to_reset: The reset process has expired. Please log in and start the password reset process again, or contact mindtrix.xyz@gmail.com for assistance.
h4_modal_description_successful_reset: You have successfully reset your password. Let's go back to creating in the forest!
p_confirm_new_password_format_reminder: Please input the password that matches the new one.
p_content_reset_password: This password will be used as a two-way verification for important operations, such as: listing digital creations, deleting accounts.
